Title: II.
Writer: Jonathan E. Steinberg (creator), Robert Levine (creator), Jonathan E. Steinberg, Robert Levine
Actors: Toby Stephens, Hannah New, Luke Arnold, Jessica Parker Kennedy
Plot: Flint unmasks a thief on his crew. Rackham chases a score over Vane's objection. Silver hides with Max in the brothel. Eleanor faces an impossible choice.
